  • Force field

Force fieldÂ¶

To employ some popular force fields, GALAMOST accommodate the potential functions which are listed in this subsection. They are classified into

  • Short range non-bonded interactions
    • Lennard-Jones (LJ) interaction
    • Shift Lennard-Jones (LJ) interaction
    • Pair interaction
      • Harmonic repulsion
      • Gaussian repulsion
      • IPL potential
      • Script commands
  • Bonded interactions
    • Bond stretching
      • Harmonic bond potential
      • FENE bond potential
      • Polynominal bond potential
      • Morse bond potential
    • Angle bending
      • Harmonic angle potential
      • Cosine harmonic angle potential
      • Cosine angle potential
    • Dihedral torsion
      • Harmonic dihedral potential
      • OPLS dihedral potential
  • Numerical interaction
    • Non-bonded interaction
    • Bond interaction
    • Angle interaction
    • Dihedral interaction
  • Coulomb interaction
    • Ewald summation theory
    • Ewald (short-range part)
    • PPPM (long-range part)
    • ENUF (long-range part)
